data.text: @Abhishe25012081 @DrBirendraShar2 Bugatti La Voiture Noire will do.

@fateh_siddiqui @DrBirendraShar2 What a stupid statement....in the Afghanistan evacuation even the U.S deployed C-17 which the IAF is also doing now...u want the govt to bring the students back in a Ferrari or Lamborghini?

@DrBirendraShar2 Ok , tell me who can be a perfect PM for India ???

#ISupportGovtOfIndia doesn't matter, which party he belong.

U people only points weakness of someone's (even in your own family) not his/her achievements. 
#IndiaHasWeakPM  #indiahasstrongPM 
#IsupportModi
@DrBirendraShar2 Haa yo bhai war zone mei plane uda de..kl koi s400 ka missile lg gya to usmei bhi modi ji ko bologe..border se bahar to khud hi aana padega inko
@DrBirendraShar2 @NabanitaPradha5 Then why don't you go there and verify everything with your eyes first hand??

@DrBirendraShar2 Instead of waking up the Indian students at that time, you yourself was fall asleep......Don't cry...............&.....Now you should leave for #Ukraine to evacuate the indian students...help them dude...#IndiaHasWeakPM https://t.co/FPZ3htuDuq

@DrBirendraShar2 Ch***ya hai kya Bhai?

#Ukraine
